meanings.definition: To go beyond the limits of what is considered acceptable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: She was overstepping by telling others what to do.
meanings.sent2: The player was overstepping the marked boundaries during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat was overstepping its authority by trying to boss around the dog.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was overstepping the boundaries of reality.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned the students about overstepping the rules in the classroom.

meanings.definition: To exceed or surpass a boundary or limit.
meanings.sent1: The company's profits were overstepping all expectations.
meanings.sent2: The floodwaters were overstepping the riverbanks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The cake was overstepping its deliciousness with extra layers of frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her voice overstepped the noise of the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's speed overstepped the limits of human capability.
